events.title: Lunar New Year Bingo in Alta Sierra
events.venue_name: Trailblazer Craft Pizza and Brews: Alta Sierra
events.description: Please join us for various fun prizes with Lunar New Year-themed bingo at Trailblazer Craft Pizza and Brews in Alta Sierra Doors open at 5:00 pm; players must check in by 5:45 to play, and bingo begins at 6:00 pm for ten games. For more information and to purchase tickets now for this popular event with limited tickets available, please click here: https://events.asnagv.com/lunar-new-year-bingo
events.venue_address: Trailblazer Craft Pizza and Brews: Alta Sierra, 15690 Johnson Place, Grass Valley, CA, 95949, United States

events.title: Bluegrass Jam Night at Uncle Sonny's Bar
events.description: Bluegrass open jam session every Wednesday from 6:00 – 8:00 pm. All pickers and singers welcome for pickin’, toe-tappin’ fun at Uncle Sonny’s Bar: 13475 Colfax Highway/174 Grass Valley, CA 95945
events.venue_address: Uncle Sonny’s Bar, 13475 Colfax Hwy, Grass Valley, CA, 95945, United States

events.title: Ottmar Liebert and Luna Negra at the Center for the Arts
events.description: The Center for the Arts in Grass Valley presents Ottmar Liebert with Luna Negra from 7:00 – 9:00 pm on Wednesday, February 25th, 2026. German-born guitarist Ottmar Liebert has enthralled audiences worldwide with his signature blend of flamenco, Latin, and world music. Since founding Luna Negra in 1989, he has released 33 albums, including the multi-platinum Nouveau Flamenco, and earned five Grammy nominations. Known for evocative melodies, virtuosic guitar work, and immersive performances, Liebe
events.venue_address: The Center for the Arts, 314 W. Main Street, Grass Valley, CA, 95945, United States

events.title: Gary Regina and Friends at Elixart
events.description: Local staple of the well-beloved “In the Loop” project, Gary Regina, will bring other amazing musicians to Elixart – complementing his virtuosic woodwind-based grooves from 7:00 – 10:00 pm on Wednesday, February 25th. With guitarists (including local legend, Aja) and drummers joining Gary, he is free from the loop to embellish his amazing saxophone, clarinet, and flute lead lines over the accompanying musicians.
events.venue_address: Elixart, 203 York St., Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: "Broadway in Love" at the Miners Foundry
events.description: Please join us at the Miners Foundry in downtown Nevada City from 7:00 – 9:00 pm on Wednesday, February 25th for Broadway in Love – where if you love Broadway musicals, prepare to be swept off your feet! The doors and bar will open at 6:00 p.m., and the show begins at 7:00 p.m. Enjoy sensational Broadway performers and married couple, Libby Servais (Wicked) and Stephan Stubbins (Mary Poppins) as they celebrate Broadway’s most beloved songs – along with the Broadway in Love combo (piano, bass, pe
events.venue_address: Miners Foundry, 325 Spring Street, Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: Boots 'n' Besties Line Dance Nights in Truckee
events.description: Please come out for some country line-dancing from 8:00 to 10:00 pm on the second and fourth Wednesday of each month at Alibi Ale Works in Truckee. Hayli and Lily will lead some line-dancing lessons and play some of your favorite line dance and country songs. Cover charge at the door. Please bring cash (preferred) or credit card. Please note: this event is 21 and over only.
events.venue_address: Alibi Ale Works – Truckee, 10069 Bridge Street, Truckee, CA, 96161, United States

events.title: "One River, Many Visions" Exhibit at the Seven Stars Gallery
events.venue_name: Nevada City Odd Fellows Seven Stars Gallery
events.description: Nine local artists celebrate our “back yard” part of the great atmospheric and oceanic river that flows around the globe. Exhibiting artists are: Gail Lipson, Denise Wey, Jeff Bousfield, Beth Leydon, Chic Lotz, Steve Curl, Miriam Morris, Risa Roseman, Juliette Williams, Inge Ivens, and Leah Ellis The artists reception is from 5:00 – 7:00 pm on Friday, February 13th. Regular gallery hours are: Thursdays – Sundays, from 11:00 am to 5:00 pm For questions or to contact the gallery, please click here
events.venue_address: Nevada City Odd Fellows Seven Stars Gallery, 210 Spring St., Nevada City, 95959

events.title: Nevada Union Diorama and Collage: Student Art Exhibit Opening Reception
events.venue_name: Nevada Union High School Art Gallery – Room D13
events.description: Nevada Union High School invites the community to an opening reception celebrating student artwork featuring dioramas, collage art, and photography. Come meet the student artists, and view their work in a gallery setting. Light refreshments will be served. From 5:00 – 7:00 pm on Wednesday, February 26th in the Nevada Union Art Gallery (Room D13) in Grass Valley.
events.venue_address: Nevada Union High School Art Gallery – Room D13, 11761 Ridge Road, Grass Valley, CA, 95945, United States

events.title: Acoustic Jam and Open Mic Night at the Wild Eye
events.description: After a few songwriter requests, we’re planning on having this acoustic jam and open mic night more often, at least a couple of Thursdays per month. We’ll have various hosts. This open mic welcomes songwriters, acoustic jammers, and players from music’s softer side. The pub has a PA, lights, and some instruments, or bring yours. Come by and play or just listen. Doors open at 5:00 pm. No cover – but donations are welcome. __________________ About Wild Eye Pub: We’re a family-friendly event venue,
events.venue_address: Wild Eye Pub, 535 Mill Street, Grass Valley, CA, 95945, United States

events.title: Steve Yerkey at Elixart
events.description: A local legend of Americana, both covers and originals, Steve Yerkey brings his explosive stage presence to Elixart for a night of classic throwbacks and powerful originals from 7:00 – 10:00 pm on Thursday, February 26th. Playing old favorites from the ’60s, ’70s, and ’80s – Steve brings a powerful take on some of the most beloved tunes from those classic eras.
events.venue_address: Elixart, 203 York St., Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: Truckee Silent Movies Presents: Charlie Chaplin's "City Lights" at Alibi Ale Works
events.description: Tired of green screens and CGI? Truckee Silent Movies has partnered with Alibi Ale Works in Truckee to bring back classic silent movies accompanied by live music! To celebrate the Valentine’s month of February, they present Charlie Chaplin’s most famous love story, City Lights, which has just been released into the public domain. Come enjoy life and love in all its humor and complexity, along with good beer and food. The movie screens at Alibi Ale Works in Truckee from 7:00 – 9:30 pm on Thursday
events.venue_address: Alibi Ale Works – Truckee, 10069 Bridge Street, Truckee, CA, 96161, United States

events.title: Band Beyond Description: Bob Weir Tribute, Part Two (Rescheduled)
events.description: Hey fans of BBD – we have rescheduled this show on a new date due to a heavy snow forecast. This has required some lineup shuffling, but we are committed to making this happen. The great news is that Jonny Mojo will be back leading the band, fresh off his Hawaiian honeymoon! Our Bobby Weir tribute back on January 15th was such a lightning rod event for the community, that we have decided once was not enough. It feels really important to fully engage in another round of paying our respects to Bob
events.venue_address: Crazy Horse Saloon, 230 Commercial Street, Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: Mountain Stream Meditation: "Open Temple Fridays"
events.description: Each Friday, Mountain Stream Meditation in Nevada City opens the doors from 11:30 am to 1:00 pm for Open Temple Fridays as follows: – The center is open from 11:30 am – 1:15 pm. – Silent meditation is from 12:30 – 1:00 pm. This is a chance to enjoy Sangha and tea, recharge with a new (or old) book from our library, and practice together. On occasion, teachers may offer pop-up Dharma discussions as well. Thank you for all the ways you participate and for your generosity! We are also calling for v
events.venue_address: Mountain Stream Meditation, 710 Zion Stret, Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: Gardens of Huemanity at Axis Gallery
events.description: Gardens of Huemanity by Delgreta Brown is an exploration of multiple environments — terrestrial, aquatic, celestial, and aerial. In a time where communities are challenged by the notion of belonging to society or lands, Delgreta Brown asserts that these vibrant, beautiful environments are enriched by an array of hues and inhabited by the African diaspora’s presence. Gardens of Huemanity is a visual and sensory effort to activate resilience. Delgreta depicts the African diaspora in these natural
events.venue_address: Axis Gallery, 625 S Street, Sacramento, CA, 95811, United States

events.title: Porcelain Ashtray at Axis Gallery
events.description: Friday, February 6th through Sunday, March 1st with regular gallery hours from noon t0 5:00 pm, Friday – Sunday. Second Saturday Reception from 5:00 – 8:00 pm on February 14th. Axis Gallery is pleased to present Porcelain Ashtray, an exhibition of new works by Sacramento-based artist Adam Cochran. Family slides taken in the 1950s, 60’s, and 70’s have been reworked and re-imagined as oil paintings, creating intimate moments of reflection and connection. With these paintings, Cochran has grappled
events.venue_address: Axis Gallery, 625 S Street, Sacramento, CA, 95811, United States

events.title: ThunderCon 2026: Tabletop Gaming Convention at the Miners Foundry
events.description: ThunderCon 2026 is a two‑day tabletop gaming convention taking place from noon to 10:00 pm on Friday, February 27th and Saturday, February 28th at the Miners Foundry in Nevada City, offering guided role‑playing adventures for all ages, skill levels, and interests! Every session is led by an experienced Dungeon Master, with dedicated youth tables, beginner‑friendly one‑shots, and advanced campaigns for seasoned players. Doors open at noon each day, with games running continuously until 10:00 pm,
events.venue_address: Miners Foundry, 325 Spring Street, Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: Alibi Ale Works: Annual Cookie Beer Tasting with Girl Scouts of Sierra NV
events.description: You know when you’re at work, the clock hits 4:00 pm and all you want is a treat? We get it. That’s why we joined up with the Sierra NV Girl Scouts to offer you a beer and cookie pairing from 4:00 – 7:00 pm on Friday, February 27th at Alibi Ale Works in Truckee! Get a flight of four beers paired perfectly with four Girl Scout cookies, for one low price – so please come out and support our local Girl Scouts! Cookies will be available for purchase to take home, or eat in the car on your way home.
events.venue_address: Alibi Ale Works – Truckee, 10069 Bridge Street, Truckee, CA, 96161, United States

events.title: Bob Woods Trio at 5 Mile House
events.description: Your favorite Nevada County band hits 5 Mile House.
events.venue_address: 5 Mile House, 18551 Highway 20, Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: Grease, Grit, and Grime: Back at the Crazy Horse
events.description: We are excited to welcome back a former mainstay to the Crazy Horse stage for a free early gig from 5:00 – 8:00 pm on Friday, February 27th! Grease, Grit and Grime has been a longtime, local institution for anyone who loves the blues. They like to call it “Dirty Blues”, but it goes down smooth like a mint julep on a sunny afternoon. When it comes to the sultry, dance-inducing side of the blues equation, you can be sure they have that covered. Harp maestro Scott Hickman leads the charge.
events.venue_address: Crazy Horse Saloon, 230 Commercial Street, Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: Moore's Code Brings the Funk to Wild Eye Pub
events.description: Please come out and play with Moore’s Code at the Wild Eye! They’re back with funk and R’n’B to rock your soul, and get your feet in a dance frenzy from 6:30 – 9:30 pm on Friday, February 27th! Here’s a fun fan review from Jeannie Tofanelli, who recommends: “OMG! Funk, soul, DANCING! Great vocals, funky beats, high energy. Don’t miss this band!” (Thanks, Jeannie!) Moore’s Code is: Paul Lear (keyboards, vocals), Beau Askew (beats), John Lucas (guitar), Tunde Milliner (bass, vocals), Gary Regina (
events.venue_address: Wild Eye Pub, 535 Mill Street, Grass Valley, CA, 95945, United States

events.title: Mountain Stream Meditation: Weekly "Room to Breathe" Recovery Sangha
events.description: The Buddha taught that due to craving, greed, anger, and confusion, the mind may be a source of great suffering. Room to Breathe is a peer-led, in-person weekly recovery sangha – where we explore a Buddhist approach to recovery from addictions of all kinds using the practices and principles of the Four Noble Truths and the Eightfold Path. We use the Recovery Dharma format, emphasizing the “three jewels” of the Buddhist practice: the Buddha (the potential for our own awakening), the Dharma (the t
events.venue_address: Mountain Stream Meditation, 710 Zion Stret, Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: Dirty Laundry, Dusty the Kid, and Awkward Pocket at Sans Backup Plan Records
events.description: Please come enjoy some live local music in your local record shop from 7:00 – 10:00 pm on Friday, February 27th at Sans Backup Records in Nevada City! It’ll be an evening of weird folk for well … weird folk. Admission to the show is just pay what you can at the door, and all ages are welcome!
events.venue_address: Sans Backup Plan Records, 748 Zion Street, #A, Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: Hank Meals Presents "What’s in a Name" at the Nevada Theatre (New Date/Time)
events.description: What’s in a Name: Local Literature Lurking in a Lucid Landscape – is a lively slide slow presentation about our tongue-tripping topography by Hank Meals from 7:30 to 9:30 pm on Saturday, February 27th at the Nevada Theatre in downtown Nevada City. Who hasn’t been awed by the simplicity, elegance, mystery and humor of the place names found in the Sierra Nevada? Names like: Hornswoggle Creek, Shenanigan Flat, Starvation Bar, and Sugarloaf. Naming these places allowed us to navigate in the landscap
events.venue_address: Nevada Theatre, 401 Broad St., Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: Ronnie Baker Brooks: Award-winning Blues Guitar at Sutter Creek Theatre
events.description: 8:00 – 10:00 pm on Friday, February 27th (with doors opening at 7:30). Open seating, with beer and wine available for purchase. Ronnie took home three 2025 Blues Music Awards, presented by the Blues Foundation: Contemporary Blues Artist Of The Year (Male); Contemporary Blues Album Of The Year (for Blues in My DNA); and Song of the Year for the title track. AllMusic said, “Blues in My DNA is in a class of its own — resonant, sophisticated, and soulful.” Chicago’s WGN-TV declared, “Ronnie Baker Br
events.venue_address: Sutter Creek Theatre, 44 Main Street, Sutter Creek, CA, 95685, United States

events.title: Leucas Loves at Elixart
events.description: Leucas is a well-known DJ from the Bay who has moved to our little mountain sanctuary community, and has brought a high level of DJ/event production skill that sets a new bar for our beloved local scene. He spins deeply curated sets that span the spectrum of time and genre, while containing a cultural awareness of global cultures, which is sure to excite even the most seasoned music aficionados.
events.venue_address: Elixart, 203 York St., Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: Karaoke Fridays at the Dew Drop Inn
events.description: The karaoke fun starts at 8:30 pm, and lasts until you’re done singing (or at 11:30 pm)! Every Friday at the Dew Drop Inn – come show us what you got!
events.venue_address: The Dew Drop Inn, 19729 Cerrito Rd, Grass Valley, CA, 95949, United States

events.title: Bella Rayne Band at the Crazy Horse
events.description: Bella Rayne is an 18-year-old, self-taught guitar phenom from Mendocino who is on a rocket to the moon, as her infectious presence has become ubiquitous on high-profile stages throughout the western hemisphere. It’s one thing to have talent at a young age; Bella has the casual swagger of an old soul on this planet doing what she’s meant to do. Her love for the Grateful Dead, ’70s psychedelic rock, and 90s grunge has been distilled into her own fresh approach, showing how it pays to have parents
events.venue_address: Crazy Horse Saloon, 230 Commercial Street, Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: UC Master Gardeners of Nevada Country Free Workshop: "Garden Journaling and Planning"
events.description: Please join the UC Master Gardeners of Nevada County for a free workshop on Garden Journaling and Planning, from 10:00 – noon on Saturday, February 28th at the Madelyn Helling Library in Nevada City! Learn the fun and importance of garden journaling. Explore garden maps, weather data, plant growth and more. You can always check our website for the latest schedule updates, here: ncmg.ucanr.edu. UCCE Master Gardeners are volunteers who are trained and certified by the University of California to p
events.venue_address: Madelyn Helling Library, 980 Helling Way, Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States
